data.title: GOLDEN FINANCE LIMITED company key information
data.meta_description: GOLDEN FINANCE LIMITED is a Private limited company (Ltd.) company based in 84 ALBION COURT ATTLEBOROUGH ROAD, United Kingdom, which employs 2 people. The company started trading on 12 April 1983. The company registration number is 01714383, It’s main line of business activity is Other credit granting n.e.c, and the company is listed as Active. According to the latest confirmation statements submitted on the 2021-07-31, there are currently 2 directors.
data.text:
Financial statements of GOLDEN FINANCE LIMITED

According to GOLDEN FINANCE LIMITED latest financial report submitted on 2021-07-31, the company has a Total-Assets of £284,559.00, Working-Capital of £283,812.00 while the Total-Liabilities is £40,137.00. Compared with the previous year, the company reported a Total-Assets decrease of -0.12%, which is an equivalent of 347. At the same time, the Working-Capital went down by -0.12%, or by 347.

GOLDEN FINANCE LIMITED Shareholders

View all shareholders

There are currently 5 people with significant control at GOLDEN FINANCE LIMITED. One of of major shareholders of GOLDEN FINANCE LIMITED is UDHAM SINGH KANG, which owns 75000 ORDINARY shares, with a total value of 75,000 GBP and AMARJIT AVTAR SINGH KHANGURE, which owns 10000 ORDINARY shares, with a total value of 10,000 GBP and KULDIP KAUR KANG, which owns 10000 ORDINARY shares, with a total value of 10,000 GBP and GILL PROPERTIES LIMITED, which owns 40000 ORDINARY shares, with a total value of 40,000 GBP and DALBAGH SINGH KANG, which owns 20000 ORDINARY shares, with a total value of 20,000 GBP.
